item.description:
If anyone knows me, they know there's almost nothing I love more than food and stand up comedy!

Itinerary
4:30 Meeting up at the JCC if you would like to carpool - there is plenty of street parking on Elmgrove to leave your car
5:30 Arriving at Brick Alley - Voted Best Restaurant for 2007 - Check out the Menu at http://www.brickalley...
7:30 Going to Joel McHale Show [http://www.eonline.co...]

Benefits of carpooling:
+ sharing the costs of gas
+ sharing the costs of parking
+ a much more fun and cozy ride to Newport
+ smaller carbon footprint

Please consider carpooling to this event!

I will be purchasing tickets on the evening of Monday, 7/23. If you wish to sit with the group, please give me money BEFORE then so I can purchase them together. The cost of tickets are $34.75 ($28 + fees)
item.name: Dinner and Comedy in Newport
